title: Rockefeller cod with fennel salad and a classic white wine sauce
description: Rockefeller is a vibrant herb sauce famously served with oysters. Try it here with a fried cod fillet and fennel salad.
ingredients: 2 tbsp grated hard cheese, such as parmesan
2 carrots, thinly sliced at an angle
½ bunch fresh dill, finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
